descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Marcus Smart's patience pays off as he draws two defenders to throw a nice lob to Robert Williams III for an and-1 dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Smart hooks up Williams with alley-oop pass) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smart hooks up Williams with alley-oop pass

videos.description: Robert Williams III throws down another alley-oop slam as he and Marcus Smart connect once again on the lob pass.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Smart connects with Williams on another alley-oop dunk) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smart connects with Williams on another alley-oop dunk

videos.description: Al Horford reads the miss and glides to the rim to grab the rebound and stuff down a dunk for the Celtics.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Horford flies in for a putback slam) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Horford flies in for a putback slam

videos.description: Dennis Schroder finds a streaking Jayson Tatum on the break for an emphatic two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum throws down ferocious jam on the break) 2022/02/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum throws down ferocious jam on the break
